entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.8°C

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
